offerings.name: Rogue Bachata Classes
offerings.description: Improve your Bachata by focusing on basic bachata steps and movements in a fun and friendly atmosphere. Perfect for beginners and those looking to strengthen their foundation.

instructors.bio: Boadicea and Oscar are an experienced Bachata couple with prior experience in various dances. Together, they bring a special Rogue Bachata style to the dancefloor and are known for their unique connection and musicality. Their style is much sought after by people attending the socials, and they have decided to help others achieve this connection by imparting the knowledge they have gained over the years.

offerings.name: Rogue Resonance Workshops
offerings.description: Take your dancing to the next level. If you want to further improve your technique and understanding of partner dance with lead and follow, this is for you. Explore the core principles of Rogue Resonance—groundedness, flow, and authentic connection.

instructors.bio: Oscar is a performer at the highest levels of theatre and has over 20 years experience on the social dance floor. His Rogue style evolved by bringing his stage experience as a performer onto the dance floor, combining the best of both worlds into the Rogue style.

principles.name: Rogue Body, Bond, Beyond
principles.description: Ground in yourself, listen to your partner, expand into the space

principles.name: Rogue Legato
principles.description: Your center of gravity travels on a continuous, unbroken path

principles.name: Rogue Pause, Presence, Pivot
principles.description: Stop the movement, find each other, then redirect together

principles.name: Rogue Bounce and Roll
principles.description: When bodies meet, rebound elastically or redirect

principles.name: Rogue Humility
principles.description: Surrender your movement when connection is lost; seek the partner before continuing

principles.name: Rogue Lazy
principles.description: Relaxed and lazy, yet in time—a paradox found in both music and dance

upcomingEvents.description: Join Oscar for an immersive Rogue Resonance workshop at Create Destroy Studios. This session will explore the core principles of Rogue Resonance—groundedness, flow, and authentic connection. Suitable for all levels.

pastEvents.venue: Our Lady of Hal RC Church

pastEvents.description: The inaugural Rogue Resonance workshop. Participants explored the core principles: Bounce and Roll, Stop and Connect, Groundedness, Flow, and Connection. A welcoming container for all experience levels with tea, coffee, and great music.
